attributes.additional_details:
The British public have finally been granted limited access to previously classified UFO reports originating within the UK.

For many years the truth has been withheld from the general public, and now we the people see no just cause for the continued secrecy behind this very real phenomena.

We, the undersigned, ask the British government to share with it's citizens the full truth that it knows  about UFOs and any visitations to earth by beings or probes not from this planet.
